collection.description: The collection of cascade select nodes

allowParentSelection.description: Whether parent (branch) items can be selectable

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

closeOnSelect.description: Whether the cascade-select should close when an item is selected

defaultHighlightedValue.description: The initial highlighted value of the cascade-select when rendered.

defaultOpen.description:
The initial open state of the cascade-select when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the open state.

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the cascade-select when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the value.

form.description: The form attribute of the underlying input element

formatValue.description: Function to format the display value

highlightedValue.description: The controlled highlighted value of the cascade-select

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  label: string
  control: string
  trigger: string
  indicator: string
  clearTrigger: string
  positioner: string
  content: string
  hiddenInput: string
  list(valuePath: string): string
  item(valuePath: string): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the cascade-select elements. Useful for composition.

immediate.description: Whether to synchronize the present change immediately or defer it to the next frame

loopFocus.description: Whether the cascade-select should loop focus when navigating with keyboard

name.description: The name attribute of the underlying input element

onExitComplete.description: Function called when the animation ends in the closed state

onFocusOutside.description: Function called when the focus is moved outside the component

onHighlightChange.description: Called when the highlighted value changes

onInteractOutside.description: Function called when an interaction happens outside the component

onOpenChange.description: Called when the open state changes

onPointerDownOutside.description: Function called when the pointer is pressed down outside the component

open.description: The controlled open state of the cascade-select

positioning.description: The positioning options for the cascade-select content

present.description: Whether the node is present (controlled by the user)

scrollToIndexFn.description: Function to scroll to a specific index in a list

skipAnimationOnMount.description: Whether to allow the initial presence animation.

value.description: The controlled value of the cascade-select
